dmca.title: URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement on Win2osx Site Hosted by ThePlanet.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: David Hayes [mailto:DHayes@Fenwick.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 16, 2006 2:53 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: URGENT: Notice of Copyright Infringement on Win2osx Site Hosted by
ThePlanet.com



Dear Mr. Poletes, 

Please see the attached urgent notice letter concerning copyright
infringement occuring on the Win2osx site hosted by ThePlanet.com and
immediate action requested with respect to same.  A copy of this letter has
also been faxed to you at (214) 782-7756.

Sincerely, 

David Hayes 
Fenwick & West LLP 
San Francisco, California 
<<Letter re Infringement on Win2osx Site.pdf>> 







  _____  

IRS Circular 230  Disclosure:  To ensure compliance with requirements
imposed by the IRS, we inform you that any U.S. federal tax advice in this
communication (including attachments) is not intended or written by Fenwick
& West LLP to be used, and cannot be used, for the purpose of (i) avoiding
penalties under the Internal Revenue Code or (ii) promoting, marketing, or
recommending to another party any transaction or matter addressed herein. 
  _____  

ATTENTION:
The information contained in this message may be legally privileged and
confidential.  It is intended to be read only by the individual or entity to
whom it is addressed or by their designee. If the reader of this message is
not the intended recipient, you are on notice that any distribution of this
message, in any form, is strictly prohibited. 
If you have received this message in error, please immediately notify the
sender and/or Fenwick & West LLP by telephone at (650) 988-8500 and delete
or destroy any copy of this message.
